    • createRating

      public void createRating(Model.Movie movie, String username, double score, String comment)
      Create a new Rating and add it into the database file after validating the attributes If attributes are invalid, do nothing If database file exists, read existing records, append a new Rating object, and save the file If database file does not exist, write Rating object to a new file and save
      Parameters:
      movie - Movie that this Rating will be added to
      username - List of cinemas of this cineplex
      score - Score given by user (0 to 5)
      comment - Optional comment accompanying rating
